attributes.action: Invoke article 50 of Lisbon treaty. People have voted for Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Prime Minister previously stated that he will invoke Article 50 same day. This has not been done. It is important to respect the vote and choice people have made. This is democracy. We have to respect that choice and start the process. I am not big fan of out but I am fan of democracy. Respect what peopl have voted for.
attributes.background: Article 50 of Lisbon treaty need to be invoked so that the process for Brexit can start.Prime minister need to respect the vote and choice people have made.
